name: Wild Bird Hunter :Hunting Shooting Simulation free
name_original: Wild Bird Hunter :Hunting Shooting Simulation free
description:
Desert Bird Sniper Hunter is about hunting in the hot desert where you have been caught among the deadliest birds group. Now you have to fight and shoot with precision for survival. If you got late in shooting the deadly birds then you are almost going to be blind as birds first attack will be at your eyes.

If you love hunting then birds sniper hunting is the best game you have ever played. Enjoy and shoot until all of them have been killed and you can go back easily.
